text: Ra thulo umeraki striharu jasala'i vivahako asa ra iccha chaina, ra uniharule luga phuka'era ta'uko khula garne gardachin bhane uniharumathi kunai dosa chaina, tara yasa sartama ki uniharule aphno srrngarako pradarsana garne ho'inan. Taipani yadi yasabata pani savadhani rakhchina bhane (yo) uniharuko nimti ramro huncha ra allaha ramrari sundacha, jandacha
